title: Certified Penetration Testing Specialist (CPTS) Certification
description: Preparing for the Hack The Box Certified Penetration Testing Specialist (CPTS) certification to validate offensive security skills through hands-on exploitation of networks, web applications, and Active Directory within a simulated enterprise environment.
